DOC.brief_summary: Infection human papillomavirus ( HPV ) clearly establish central cause cervical cancer . Indeed , certain oncogenic type HPV infect cervix ( part uterus womb ) . This infection may go away , go away ( call persistent infection ) , lead woman long period time cancer cervix . This study evaluate immunogenicity safety GSK Biologicals HPV-16/18 vaccine 12 month , woman 55 year age study start . Approximately 660 study subject receive HPV vaccine administer intramuscularly accord 0-1-6 month schedule . The study extend assess long-term safety immunogenicity HPV-16/18 vaccine . The Protocol Posting update order comply FDA Amendment Act , Sep 2007 .
